content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One of the most important things that the company invests heavily in is the constant growth and training of employees. To accomplish this, the company has a special portal: Learn. There, you can find a huge variety of programs, trainings, and materials. They will help you to reinforce your knowledge, learn new skills, and deepen your understanding of existing skills.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":55443,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3db122f3-8cf7-4cf8-a689-a8669942d639/cran_character_13-Education and Mentoring.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3db122f3-8cf7-4cf8-a689-a8669942d639/cran_character_13-Education and Mentoring.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"cran_character_13-Education and Mentoring.png\",\"name\":\"cran_character_13-Education and Mentoring.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3db122f3-8cf7-4cf8-a689-a8669942d639\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":365,\"height\":365},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our department, of course, is no exception. As is clear from the name of the department, we focus our efforts on creating learning opportunities for Microsoft technologies, primarily .NET.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One such opportunity is our mentoring programs. A \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"mentoring\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" program is a specialized course with prepared materials that cover specific areas of knowledge. As part of the course, mentors work with mentees to help them master skills, understand theory and practice, and answer questions. As part of the program, mentees also do practical homework, which is then graded by a mentor.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The department has several mentoring programs for engineers of various levels. T-Shape implies the presence of a variety of knowledge in addition to the main specialization in .NET, which will help to more effectively solve a different range of tasks that employees often face on projects. The program will allow you to expand your horizons and help you better understand popular technologies and approaches to developing complex Program\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This program is not related to mentoring and is most suitable for A3+ level employees who have worked at the company for more than six months. It consists of just one meeting with a highly experienced employee of the company who will help you understand the various areas of career growth. This will help you to make a more deliberate decision about which direction to choose.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{\"colSpan\":2,\"rowSpan\":1},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"                                                                                                           \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Programs for Managers  \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{\"style\":\"none\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=0abb4e32-be25-46a7-8730-c8caa5828970\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Managers' Mentoring Program\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you see your growth in the direction of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"management\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", then this is the program for you. Suitable for A4+ level employees. Within the program, a more experienced manager will work with you one-on-one on a more personal level and will help you understand the various intricacies of a manager's work, analyzing and working through specific situations.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We also have great \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=d061d7d3-3280-405d-9bf6-a9f55d3fed7f\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"program\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for those who want to become managers.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can discuss the need to participate in a particular mentoring program with your resource manager, assessing your current level of knowledge and experience and identifying growth points and what result you want to achieve. Note that participation in these programs will require additional time and effort to study the materials and do practical tasks, so consider your workload and plan your time accordingly. Participation in programs should be taken in all seriousness as the number of places in the programs is limited – so register for them consciously.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Become a mentor\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mentors participating in mentoring programs are also employees of the company. If you like teaching other less experienced engineers, then join the mentoring team in the program that interests you. Participation as a mentor will not only help other employees to grow – it will also help you maintain your own knowledge and develop soft skills. You’ll have to work closely with other employees, transfer your knowledge to them, answer questions, and check their homework. As always, you can discuss this with your resource manager.\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More
